AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Wild Born Resurreviewy
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Resurreviewy born of parents who escaped from an experimental facility. In order to avoid capture by other species, she simply accumulated the knowledge of life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Born of advanced civilization
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Resurreviewy living on an advanced planet that solved the problem of living forever. However, one day an attack happened and she was taken away by her attackers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Traveler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was traveling aimlessly with his friends. Sometimes they met other races and ate together.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Examinee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] once lived in a laboratory. She was always looking for something to find out about herself by having them research her.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Laborer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to work as a mining laborer in one of the mines to learn the limits of her immortal body. Her experience there gave her a good opportunity to acquire mining know-how.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of an army. Because she was immortal, she was primarily responsible for close combat and helping her allies shoot.
